                                                                                                                                                  SAME-Infer: Software Assisted Memory Resilience for Efficient Inference at the Edge
                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                  • Irina Alam, 
                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                  • Puneet Gupta
                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                  MEMSYS 2020: The International Symposium on Memory SystemsSeptember 2020, pp 10â22https://doi.org/10.1145/3422575.3422774
                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                   Design of edge devices is driven by the need for the lowest possible cost and energy
                  consumption. Both of these are strongly affected by on-chip memories as they often
                  constitute a large fraction of embedded processors. One way to reduce energy ...

                                                                                                                                                    • 0
                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                    • 23
                                                                                                                                                      •

                                       Create a New Binder

                                                                                                                                                    research-article
                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                    May 2020
                                                                                                                                                    
         
         
                                                                                                                                                    Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                    Artifacts Available
                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                    Contention-aware application performance prediction for disaggregated memory systems
                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                    • Felippe Vieira Zacarias, 
                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                    • Rajiv Nishtala, 
                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                    • Paul Carpenter
                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                    CF '20: Proceedings of the 17th ACM International Conference on Computing FrontiersMay 2020, pp 49â59https://doi.org/10.1145/3387902.3392625
                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                    Disaggregated memory has recently been proposed as a way to allow flexible and fine-grained
                  allocation of memory capacity to compute jobs. This paper makes an important step
                  towards effective resource allocation on disaggregated memory systems. ...

                                                                                                                                                      June 2016

                                                                                                                                                      A bounded memory allocator for software-defined global address spaces
                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                      • FranÃ§ois Gindraud, 
                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                      • Fabrice Rastello, 
                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                      • Albert Cohen, 
                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                      • FranÃ§ois Broquedis
                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                      ISMM 2016: Proceedings of the 2016 ACM SIGPLAN International Symposium on Memory ManagementJune 2016, pp 78â88https://doi.org/10.1145/2926697.2926709
                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                       This paper presents a memory allocator targeting manycore architec- tures with distributed
                  memory. Among the family of Multi Processor System on Chip (MPSoC), these devices
                  are composed of multiple nodes linked by an on-chip network; most nodes have ...

                                                                                                                                                        Quantifying the impact of dynamic memory managers into memory-intensive applications
                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                        • Josefa DÃ­az, 
                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                        • J. Manuel Colmenar, 
                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                        • JosÃ© L. Risco-MartÃ­n, 
                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                        • JosÃ© L. Ayala, 
                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                        • Oscar Garnica
                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                        SCSC '11: Proceedings of the 2011 Summer Computer Simulation ConferenceJune 2011, pp 160â167
                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                        Modern portable devices execute multimedia applications that exhibit high resource
                  utilization. To efficiently execute these applications in embedded systems, the dynamic
                  memory subsystem needs to be optimized. This complex task can be tackled designing
                  ...

                                                                                                                                                          April 2010

                                                                                                                                                          An efficient software transactional memory using commit-time invalidation
                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                          • Justin E. Gottschlich, 
                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                          • Manish Vachharajani, 
                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                          • Jeremy G. Siek
                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                          CGO '10: Proceedings of the 8th annual IEEE/ACM international symposium on Code generation
                     and optimizationApril 2010, pp 101â110https://doi.org/10.1145/1772954.1772970
                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                          To improve the performance of transactional memory (TM), researchers have found many
                  eager and lazy optimizations for conflict detection, the process of determining if transactions can commit. Despite these optimizations,
                  nearly all TMs perform one ...

                                                                                                                                                            Improving Energy Efficiency in Memory-constrained Applications Using Core-specific
                     Power Control
                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                            • Sridutt Bhalachandra, 
                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                            • Allan Porterfield, 
                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                            • Stephen L. Olivier, 
                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                            • Jan F. Prins, 
                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                            • Robert J. Fowler
                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                            E2SC'17: Proceedings of the 5th International Workshop on Energy Efficient SupercomputingNovember 2017, Article No.: 6, pp 1â8https://doi.org/10.1145/3149412.3149418
                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                            Power is increasingly the limiting factor in High Performance Computing (HPC) at Exascale
                  and will continue to influence future advancements in supercomputing. Recent processors
                  equipped with on-board hardware counters allow real time monitoring of ...

                                                                                                                                                              • 3
                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                              Memory block based scan-BIST architecture for application-dependent FPGA testing
                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                              • Keita Ito,

                                                                                                                                                              FPGA '14: Proceedings of the 2014 ACM/SIGDA international symposium on Field-programmable gate
                     arraysFebruary 2014, pp 85â88https://doi.org/10.1145/2554688.2554764
                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                              This paper presents a scan-based BIST architecture for FPGAs used as application-specific
                  embedded devices for low-volume products. The proposed architecture efficiently utilizes
                  memory blocks, instead of logic elements, to build up BIST components such ...

                                                                                                                                                                Automatic memory partitioning: increasing memory parallelism via data structure partitioning
                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                • Yosi Ben-Asher, 
                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                • Nadav Rotem
                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                CODES/ISSS '10: Proceedings of the eighth IEEE/ACM/IFIP international conference on Hardware/software
                     codesign and system synthesisOctober 2010, pp 155â162https://doi.org/10.1145/1878961.1878989
                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                In high-level synthesis, pipelined designs are often restricted by the number of memory
                  banks available to the synthesis system. Using multiple memory banks can improve the
                  performance of accelerated applications. Currently, programmers must manually ...

                                                                                                                                                                  A program optimization for automatic database result caching

                                                                                                                                                                    •

                                                                                                                                                                    •

                                                                                                                                                                   Most popular Web applications rely on persistent databases based on languages like
                  SQL for declarative specification of data models and the operations that read and
                  modify them.                                                                                                                                                                     Using a complementary emulation-simulation co-design approach to assess application
                     readiness for processing-in-memory systems

                                                                                                                                                                      Exposing the Locality of Heterogeneous Memory Architectures to HPC Applications
                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                      • Brice Goglin
                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                      MEMSYS '16: Proceedings of the Second International Symposium on Memory SystemsOctober 2016, pp 30â39https://doi.org/10.1145/2989081.2989115
                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                      High-performance computing requires a deep knowledge of the hardware platform to fully
                  exploit its computing power. The performance of data transfer between cores and memory
                  is becoming critical. Therefore locality is a major area of optimization on the ...

                                                                                                                                                                        March 2013
                                                                                                                                                                        
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                        Shared memory aware MPSoC software deployment
                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                        • Timo SchÃ¶nwald, 
                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                        • Alexander Viehl, 
                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                        • Oliver Bringmann, 
                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                        • Wolfgang Rosenstiel
                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                        DATE '13: Proceedings of the Conference on Design, Automation and Test in EuropeMarch 2013, pp 1771â1776
                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                        In this paper we present a novel approach for mapping interconnected software components
                  onto cores of homogenous MPSoC architectures. The analytic mapping process considers
                  shared memory communication as well as the routing algorithm controlling packet-...

                                                                                                                                                                          research-article
                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                          October 2008
                                                                                                                                                                          
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                          Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                          A tuning framework for software-managed memory hierarchies
                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                          • Manman Ren, 
                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                          • Ji Young Park, 
                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                          • Mike Houston, 
                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                          • Alex Aiken, 
                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                          • William J. Dally
                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                          PACT '08: Proceedings of the 17th international conference on Parallel architectures and compilation
                     techniquesOctober 2008, pp 280â291https://doi.org/10.1145/1454115.1454155
                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                          Achieving good performance on a modern machine with a multi-level memory hierarchy,
                  and in particular on a machine with software-managed memories, requires precise tuning
                  of programs to the machine's particular characteristics. A large program on a ...
                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                            • 32
                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                            • 432
                                                                                                                                                                              •

                                                                                                                                                                            Last 12 Months4
                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                            Last 6 weeks1

                                                                                                                                                                            research-article
                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                            April 2010
                                                                                                                                                                            
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                            Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                            Towards program optimization through automated analysis of numerical precision
                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                            • Michael D. Linderman, 
                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                            • Matthew Ho, 
                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                            • David L. Dill, 
                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                            • Teresa H. Meng, 
                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                            • Garry P. Nolan
                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                            CGO '10: Proceedings of the 8th annual IEEE/ACM international symposium on Code generation
                     and optimizationApril 2010, pp 230â237https://doi.org/10.1145/1772954.1772987
                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                            Reducing the arithmetic precision of a computation has real performance implications,
                  including increased speed, decreased power consumption, and a smaller memory footprint.
                  For some architectures, e.g., GPUs, there can be such a large performance ...
                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                            
                  
                                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                              • 33
                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                              • 542
                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                              Last 12 Months22
                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                              Last 6 weeks5

                                       Create a New Binder

                                                                                                                                                                              research-article
                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                              December 2012
                                                                                                                                                                              
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                              Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                              Using memory management to detect and extract illegitimate code for malware analysis
                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                              • Carsten Willems, 
                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                              • Felix C. Freiling, 
                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                              • Thorsten Holz
                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                              ACSAC '12: Proceedings of the 28th Annual Computer Security Applications ConferenceDecember 2012, pp 179â188https://doi.org/10.1145/2420950.2420979
                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                              Exploits that successfully attack computers are typically based on some form of shellcode,
                  i.e., illegitimate code that is injected by the attacker to take control of the system.
                  Detecting and gathering such code is the first step to its detailed ...
                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                              
                  
                                                                                                                                                                              
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                • 7
                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                • 295
                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                Total Citations7
                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                Total Downloads295
                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                Last 12 Months16
                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                Last 6 weeks3
                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                •
