                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                  •

                                                                                                                                                                                research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                January 2011
                                                                                                                                                                                
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                A technique for the effective and automatic reuse of classical compiler optimizations
                     on multithreaded code
                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                • Pramod G. Joisha, 
                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                • Robert S. Schreiber, 
                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                • Prithviraj Banerjee, 
                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                • Hans J. Boehm, 
                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                • Dhruva R. Chakrabarti
                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                POPL '11: Proceedings of the 38th annual ACM SIGPLAN-SIGACT symposium on Principles of programming
                     languagesJanuary 2011, pp 623â636https://doi.org/10.1145/1926385.1926457
                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                A large body of data-flow analyses exists for analyzing and optimizing sequential
                  code. Unfortunately, much of it cannot be directly applied on parallel code, for reasons
                  of correctness. This paper presents a technique to automatically, aggressively, ...
                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                Also Published in:
                                                                                                                                                                                ACM SIGPLAN Notices: Volume 46 Issue 1, January 2011 
                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                  • 716
                                                                                                                                                                                    •

                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Citations18
                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Downloads716
                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                  Last 12 Months10
                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                  Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                    •

                                                                                                                                                                                • Get Access
                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                
                     
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                  
   
                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                  • 



                                                                                                                                                                                • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                  
   
                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                  research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                  May 1969
                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                  Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                  Fault location in memory systems by program
                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                  • C. V. Ravi
                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                  AFIPS '69 (Spring): Proceedings of the May 14-16, 1969, spring joint computer conferenceMay 1969, pp 393â401https://doi.org/10.1145/1476793.1476852
                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                  The subject of automatic fault location in memory systems by program so far has been
                  neglected in computer literature. A program (AMNESA) has been written at Honeywell
                  that not only detects failures in memory, but also diagnoses the cause of the ...
                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    • 4
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    • 38
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                    Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Citations4
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Downloads38
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 12 Months2
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 6 weeks0
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                    /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F1476793.1476852&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28memory%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28memory%29%29Highlights

                                       Create a New Binder

                                                                                                                                                                                    research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                    November 2011
                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                    Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                    Optimized pre-copy live migration for memory intensive applications
                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                    • Khaled Z. Ibrahim, 
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                    • Steven Hofmeyr, 
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                    • Costin Iancu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                    • Eric Roman
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                    SC '11: Proceedings of 2011 International Conference for High Performance Computing, Networking,
                     Storage and AnalysisNovember 2011, Article No.: 40, pp 1â11https://doi.org/10.1145/2063384.2063437
                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                    Live migration is a widely used technique for resource consolidation and fault tolerance.
                  KVM and Xen use iterative pre-copy approaches which work well in practice for commercial
                  applications. In this paper, we study pre-copy live migration of MPI and ...

                                                                                                                                                                                      • 42
                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 762
                                                                                                                                                                                        •

                                       Create a New Binder

                                                                                                                                                                                      research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                      September 2019
                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                      Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                      LLAMA - automatic memory allocations: an LLVM pass and library for automatically determining memory allocations
                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                      • Derrick Greenspan
                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                      MEMSYS '19: Proceedings of the International Symposium on Memory SystemsSeptember 2019, pp 363â372https://doi.org/10.1145/3357526.3357534
                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                      There is an expectation among experts that the memory hierarchy will be expanded to
                  provide support for multi-level memory, enabling the use of new memory technologies
                  living side-by-side with traditional DRAM. In doing so, the advantages of traditional
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                      
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                        • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                        • 114
                                                                                                                                                                                          •

                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 6 weeks5

                                                                                                                                                                                        Designing a prosthetic memory to support software developers
                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                        • Uri Dekel
                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                        ICSE Companion '08: Companion of the 30th international conference on Software engineeringMay 2008, pp 1011â1014https://doi.org/10.1145/1370175.1370225
                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                        about their activities and the resulting artifacts which helps them remain oriented,
                  avoid omissions, and correctly use artifacts. When stored only in the developer's
                  organic memory, this knowledge may degrade and cannot directly be shared with others.
                  ...

                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                          • 204
                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                       Create a New Binder

                                                                                                                                                                                          • 



                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                          
   
                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                          research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                          September 2018
                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                          Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                          Extended Memory Reuse: An Optimisation for Reducing Memory Allocations
                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                          • Hans-Nikolai VieÃmann, 
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                          • Artjoms Å inkarovs, 
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                          • Sven-Bodo Scholz
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                          IFL 2018: Proceedings of the 30th Symposium on Implementation and Application of Functional
                     LanguagesSeptember 2018, pp 107â118https://doi.org/10.1145/3310232.3310242
                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                          In this paper we present an optimisation for reference counting based garbage collection.
                  The optimisation aims at reducing the total number of calls to the heap manager while
                  preserving the key benefits of reference counting, i.e. the opportunities for ...
                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 65
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                            Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Citations1
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Downloads65
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 12 Months15
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 6 weeks4
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                            /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F3310232.3310242&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28memory%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28memory%29%29Highlights
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                           
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                          • Export Citations
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                          • Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                            Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                          • Get Access
