                                                                                                                                                                                            • 



                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                            
   
                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                            research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                            February 2015
                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                            Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                            Superoptimized Memory Subsystems for Streaming Applications
                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                            • Joseph G. Wingbermuehle, 
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                            • Ron K. Cytron, 
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                            • Roger D. Chamberlain
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                            FPGA '15: Proceedings of the 2015 ACM/SIGDA International Symposium on Field-Programmable Gate
                     ArraysFebruary 2015, pp 126â135https://doi.org/10.1145/2684746.2689069
                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                            Because main memory is many times slower than modern processor cores, deep, multi-level
                  cache hierarchies are ubiquitous in computers today. Similarly, applications deployed
                  on ASICs and FPGAs are often hindered by slow external memories. Therefore, to ...
                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 4
                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 219
                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                              Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Citations4
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Downloads219
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 12 Months4
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                              Automated memory leak fixing on value-flow slices for C programs
                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                              • Hua Yan, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                              • Yulei Sui, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                              • Shiping Chen, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                              • Jingling Xue
                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                              SAC '16: Proceedings of the 31st Annual ACM Symposium on Applied ComputingApril 2016, pp 1386â1393https://doi.org/10.1145/2851613.2851773
                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                              C is the dominant programming language for developing embedded software, operating
                  systems, and device drivers. Unlike programs written in managed languages like Java,
                  C programs rely on explicit memory management and are prone to memory leaks. Existing
                  ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                • 151
                                                                                                                                                                                                  •

                                                                                                                                                                                                Tuning applications for efficient GPU offloading to in-memory processing
                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                • Yudong Wu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                • Mingyao Shen, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                • Yi-Hui Chen, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                • Yuanyuan Zhou
                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                ICS '20: Proceedings of the 34th ACM International Conference on SupercomputingJune 2020, Article No.: 37, pp 1â12https://doi.org/10.1145/3392717.3392760
                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                Data movement between processors and main memory is a critical bottleneck for data-intensive
                  applications. This problem is more severe with Graphics Processing Units (GPUs) applications
                  due to their massive parallel data processing characteristics. ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                  Puncturing the memory wall: Joint optimization of network compression with approximate memory for ASR application
                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Qin Li, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Peiyan Dong, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Zijie Yu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Changlu Liu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Fei Qiao, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Yanzhi Wang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Huazhong Yang
                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                  ASPDAC '21: Proceedings of the 26th Asia and South Pacific Design Automation ConferenceJanuary 2021, pp 505â511https://doi.org/10.1145/3394885.3431512
                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                  The automatic speech recognition (ASR) system is becoming increasingly irreplaceable
                  in smart speech interaction applications. Nonetheless, these applications confront
                  the memory wall when embedded in the energy and memory constrained Internet of Things
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 33
                                                                                                                                                                                                      •

                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 6 weeks5
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                    /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F3394885.3431512&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28memory%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28memory%29%29Highlights

                                                                                                                                                                                                    Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                      •

                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 



                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                    research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                    September 2010
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                    Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                    Memoization of methods using software transactional memory to track internal state
                     dependencies
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Hugo Rito, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                    • JoÃ£o Cachopo
                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                    PPPJ '10: Proceedings of the 8th International Conference on the Principles and Practice of
                     Programming in JavaSeptember 2010, pp 89â98https://doi.org/10.1145/1852761.1852775
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                    Memoization is a well-known technique for improving the performance of a program,
                  but it has been confined mostly to functional programming, where no mutable state
                  or side-effects exist.
                                                                                                                                                                                                     
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                    Most object-oriented programs, however, are built around objects ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                      research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                      October 2010
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                      Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                      Automatic atomic region identification in shared memory SPMD programs
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Gautam Upadhyaya, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Samuel P. Midkiff, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Vijay S. Pai
                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                      OOPSLA '10: Proceedings of the ACM international conference on Object oriented programming systems
                     languages and applicationsOctober 2010, pp 652â670https://doi.org/10.1145/1869459.1869513
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                      This paper presents TransFinder, a compile-time tool that automatically determines which statements of an unsynchronized
                  multithreaded program must be enclosed in atomic regions to enforce conflict-serializability. Unlike previous tools, TransFinder ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                      Also Published in:
                                                                                                                                                                                                      ACM SIGPLAN Notices: Volume 45 Issue 10, October 2010 
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 11
                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 241
                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                        Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Citations11
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Downloads241
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 12 Months5
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                        The case for hardware transactional memory in software packet processing
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Martin Labrecque, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                        • J. Gregory Steffan
                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                        ANCS '10: Proceedings of the 6th ACM/IEEE Symposium on Architectures for Networking and Communications
                     SystemsOctober 2010, Article No.: 37, pp 1â11https://doi.org/10.1145/1872007.1872053
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                        Software packet processing is becoming more important to enable differentiated and
                  rapidly-evolving network services. With increasing numbers of programmable processor
                  and accelerator cores per network node, it is a challenge to support sharing and ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                                          research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                          January 2021
                                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                          Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                          On Cache Limits for Dataflow Applications and Related Efficient Memory Management
                     Strategies
                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Alemeh Ghasemi, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Rodrigo Cataldo, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Jean-Philippe Diguet, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Kevin J. M. Martin
                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                          DASIP '21: Workshop on Design and Architectures for Signal and Image Processing (14th edition)January 2021, pp 68â76https://doi.org/10.1145/3441110.3441573
                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                           The dataflow paradigm frees the designer to focus on the functionality of an application,
                  independently from the underlying architecture executing it. While mapping the dataflow
                  computational part to the cores seems obvious, the memory aspects do not ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 22
                                                                                                                                                                                                              •

                                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 12 Months22
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 6 weeks6
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                                            Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                       Create a New Binder
