                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                            research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                            November 2014
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                            A system software approach to proactive memory-error avoidance
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Carlos H. A. Costa, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Yoonho Park, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Bryan S. Rosenburg, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Chen-Yong Cher, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Kyung Dong Ryu
                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                            SC '14: Proceedings of the International Conference for High Performance Computing, Networking,
                     Storage and AnalysisNovember 2014, pp 707â718https://doi.org/10.1109/SC.2014.63
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                            Today's HPC systems use two mechanisms to address main-memory errors. Error-correcting
                  codes make correctable errors transparent to software, while checkpoint/restart (CR)
                  enables recovery from uncorrectable errors. Unfortunately, CR overhead will be ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 221
                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                              Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Citations6
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Downloads221
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 12 Months9
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 6 weeks0
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                              /action/highlight?doi=10.1109%2FSC.2014.63&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28memory%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28memory%29%29Highlights
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                              •

                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Export Citations
                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                              Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                              research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                              May 2015
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                              Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                              Software-managed energy-efficient hybrid DRAM/NVM main memory
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Ahmad Hassan, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Hans Vandierendonck, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Dimitrios S. Nikolopoulos
                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                              CF '15: Proceedings of the 12th ACM International Conference on Computing FrontiersMay 2015, Article No.: 23, pp 1â8https://doi.org/10.1145/2742854.2742886
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                              This paper evaluates the viability of user-level software management of a hybrid DRAM/NVM
                  main memory system. We propose an operating system (OS) and programming interface
                  to place data from within the user application. We present a profiling tool to ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 16
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 696
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                Metrics

                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Downloads696
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 12 Months73
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 6 weeks4

                                                                                                                                                                                                                An intelligent semi-automatic application porting system for application accelerators
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Thomas Henry Beach, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Nicholas J. Avis
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                UCHPC-MAW '09: Proceedings of the combined workshops on UnConventional high performance computing
                     workshop plus memory access workshopMay 2009, pp 7â10https://doi.org/10.1145/1531666.1531669
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                Work involving the use of application acceleration devices is showing great promise,
                  however, there are still major obstacles preventing their widespread adoption. Currently
                  the process of porting applications to an accelerator requires expertise in ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Optimizing large-scale plasma simulations on persistent memory-based heterogeneous
                     memory with effective data placement across memory hierarchy
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Jie Ren, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Jiaolin Luo, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Ivy Peng, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Kai Wu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Dong Li
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ICS '21: Proceedings of the ACM International Conference on SupercomputingJune 2021, pp 203â214https://doi.org/10.1145/3447818.3460356
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Particle simulations of plasma are important for understanding plasma dynamics in
                  space weather and fusion devices. However, production simulations that use billions
                  and even trillions of computational particles require high memory capacity. In this
                  ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                      •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Long Short-Term Memory Model Based Agriculture Commodity Price Prediction Application
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Chen Zhi Yuan, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Sin Kai Ling
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ITCC 2020: Proceedings of the 2020 2nd International Conference on Information Technology and
                     Computer CommunicationsAugust 2020, pp 43â49https://doi.org/10.1145/3417473.3417481
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Countries depending on agricultural crops have significant impacts on the world's
                  challenging issues such as world hunger and malnutrition, poverty, insufficient food
                  supply and even climatic changes. Governments who realize the importance of ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 61
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A software solution for dynamic stack management on scratch pad memory
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Arun Kannan, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Aviral Shrivastava, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Amit Pabalkar, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Jong-eun Lee
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ASP-DAC '09: Proceedings of the 2009 Asia and South Pacific Design Automation ConferenceJanuary 2009, pp 612â617
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      In an effort to make processors more power efficient scratch pad memory (SPM) have
                  been proposed instead of caches, which can consume majority of processor power. However,
                  application mapping on SPMs remain a challenge. We propose a dynamic SPM ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 9
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 170

                                                                                                                                                                                                                        From lock to correct and efficient software transactional memory
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Cheng Wang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Youfeng Wu
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        INTERACT-14: Proceedings of the 2010 Workshop on Interaction between Compilers and Computer ArchitectureMarch 2010, Article No.: 8, pp 1â8https://doi.org/10.1145/1739025.1739037
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Transactional memory solves many problems in lock-based parallel programs. Unfortunately,
                  the semantics of transactions are different from those of critical sections defined
                  by locks. The semantic differences make it difficult to correctly port existing ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 150
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Software-Defined Far Memory in Warehouse-Scale Computers
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Andres Lagar-Cavilla, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Junwhan Ahn, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Suleiman Souhlal, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Radoslaw Burny, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Shakeel Butt, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Jichuan Chang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Ashwin Chaugule, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Kamil Adam Yurtsever, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Yu Zhao, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Parthasarathy Ranganathan
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ASPLOS '19: Proceedings of the Twenty-Fourth International Conference on Architectural Support
                     for Programming Languages and Operating SystemsApril 2019, pp 317â330https://doi.org/10.1145/3297858.3304053
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Increasing memory demand and slowdown in technology scaling pose important challenges
                  to total cost of ownership (TCO) of warehouse-scale computers (WSCs). One promising
                  idea to reduce the memory TCO is to add a cheaper, but slower, "far memory" tier ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Platform dependent code generation of real-time embedded software
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • BaekGyu Kim, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Insup Lee, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Linh T. X. Phan, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Oleg Sokolsky
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ICCPS '13: Proceedings of the ACM/IEEE 4th International Conference on Cyber-Physical SystemsApril 2013, pp 246https://doi.org/10.1145/2502524.2502565
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Embedded software constitutes an important part of modern safety-critical systems,
                  such as medical devices. As embedded software is increasingly complex, assuring the
                  safety of such software becomes difficult, especially when the correct function is
                  ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F2502524.2502565&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28memory%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28memory%29%29Highlights
