                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            November 2017
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Application of a communication-avoiding generalized minimal residual method to a gyrokinetic
                     five dimensional eulerian code on many core platforms
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Y. Idomura, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • T. Ina, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • A. Mayumi, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • S. Yamada, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • K. Matsumoto, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Y. Asahi, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • T. Imamura
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ScalA '17: Proceedings of the 8th Workshop on Latest Advances in Scalable Algorithms for Large-Scale
                     SystemsNovember 2017, Article No.: 7, pp 1â8https://doi.org/10.1145/3148226.3148234
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            A communication-avoiding generalized minimal residual (CA-GMRES) method is applied
                  to the gyrokinetic toroidal five dimensional Eulerian code GT5D, and its performance
                  is compared against the original code with a generalized conjugate residual (GCR)
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 66
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Citations5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Downloads66
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 12 Months7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 6 weeks0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F3148226.3148234&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28memory%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28memory%29%29Highlights

                                                     Save to Binder

                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Sharing memory in modern distributed applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Claudio Scordino, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Bruno Morelli
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              SAC '16: Proceedings of the 31st Annual ACM Symposium on Applied ComputingApril 2016, pp 1918â1921https://doi.org/10.1145/2851613.2851950
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Traditionally, research on software distributed shared memory has been focused on
                  optimizing the memory consistency models and the coherence protocols rather than the
                  underlying run-time mechanisms. Thus, these systems have been often implemented on
                  top ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 77
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Downloads77
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 12 Months8
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                AutoTM: Automatic Tensor Movement in Heterogeneous Memory Systems using Integer Linear
                     Programming
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Mark Hildebrand, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Jawad Khan, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Sanjeev Trika, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Jason Lowe-Power, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Venkatesh Akella
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ASPLOS '20: Proceedings of the Twenty-Fifth International Conference on Architectural Support
                     for Programming Languages and Operating SystemsMarch 2020, pp 875â890https://doi.org/10.1145/3373376.3378465
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Memory capacity is a key bottleneck for training large scale neural networks. IntelÂ®
                  Optane#8482; DC PMM (persistent memory modules) which are available as NVDIMMs are
                  a disruptive technology that promises significantly higher read bandwidth than ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 995
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  March 2015
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Enabling multi-threaded applications on hybrid shared memory manycore architectures
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Tushar Rawat, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Aviral Shrivastava
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  DATE '15: Proceedings of the 2015 Design, Automation & Test in Europe Conference & ExhibitionMarch 2015, pp 742â747
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  As the number of cores per chip increases, maintaining cache coherence becomes prohibitive
                  for both power and performance. Non Coherent Cache (NCC) architectures do away with
                  hardware-based cache coherence, but become difficult to program. Some existing ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 50
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Downloads50
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 12 Months0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    January 2011
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Runtime parallelization of legacy code on a transactional memory system
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Matthew DeVuyst, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Dean M. Tullsen, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Seon Wook Kim
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    HiPEAC '11: Proceedings of the 6th International Conference on High Performance and Embedded Architectures
                     and CompilersJanuary 2011, pp 127â136https://doi.org/10.1145/1944862.1944882
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    This paper proposes a new runtime parallelization technique, based on a dynamic optimization
                  framework, to automatically parallelize single-threaded legacy programs. It heavily
                  leverages the optimistic concurrency of transactional memory. This work ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 13
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 185
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Citations13
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Downloads185
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 12 Months4
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 6 weeks1

                                                             •

                                                                                                                              
                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Get Access
