                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          automemcpy: a framework for automatic generation of fundamental memory operations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Guillaume Chatelet, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Chris Kennelly, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Sam (Likun) Xi, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Ondrej Sykora, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • ClÃ©ment Courbet, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Xinliang David Li, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Bruno De Backer
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ISMM 2021: Proceedings of the 2021 ACM SIGPLAN International Symposium on Memory ManagementJune 2021, pp 39â51https://doi.org/10.1145/3459898.3463904
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Memory manipulation primitives (memcpy, memset, memcmp) are used by virtually every
                  application, from high performance computing to user interfaces. They often consume
                  a significant portion of CPU cycles. Because they are so ubiquitous and critical,
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 32
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Downloads32
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 12 Months32
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 6 weeks32
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F3459898.3463904&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28memory%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28memory%29%29Highlights
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Export Citations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Save to Binder

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            March 2014
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            A tightly-coupled hardware controller to improve scalability and programmability of
                     shared-memory heterogeneous clusters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Paolo Burgio, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Robin Danilo, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Andrea Marongiu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Philippe Coussy, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Luca Benini
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            DATE '14: Proceedings of the conference on Design, Automation & Test in EuropeMarch 2014, Article No.: 25, pp 1â4
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Modern designs for embedded many-core systems increasingly include application-specific
                  units to accelerate key computational kernels with orders-of-magnitude higher execution
                  speed and energy efficiency compared to software counterparts. A promising ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 61
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Coping with context switches in lock-based software transactional memory
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Yehuda Afek, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Yoav Cohen, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Adam Morrison
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              SYSTOR '11: Proceedings of the 4th Annual International Conference on Systems and StorageMay 2011, Article No.: 11, pp 1â13https://doi.org/10.1145/1987816.1987831
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Lock-based software transactional memory algorithms do not perform well in workloads
                  with a high rate of context switches, which is caused for example by scheduling events
                  or page faults. This occurs since threads that are switched-out by the operating ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 158
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Downloads158
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 12 Months1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                A framework for automatic parallelization, static and dynamic memory optimization
                     in MPSoC platforms
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Yiannis Iosifidis, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Arindam Mallik, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Stylianos Mamagkakis, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Eddy De Greef, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Alexandros Bartzas, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Dimitrios Soudris, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Francky Catthoor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                DAC '10: Proceedings of the 47th Design Automation ConferenceJune 2010, pp 549â554https://doi.org/10.1145/1837274.1837410
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The key characteristic of next generation embedded applications will be the intensive
                  data transfer and storage and the need for efficient memory management. The embedded
                  system designer community needs optimization methodologies and techniques, which ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 274
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  August 2017
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  An approach to formal verification of python software transactional memory
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Branislav Kordic, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Miroslav Popovic, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Silvia Ghilezan, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Ilija Basicevic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ECBS '17: Proceedings of the Fifth European Conference on the Engineering of Computer-Based
                     SystemsAugust 2017, Article No.: 13, pp 1â10https://doi.org/10.1145/3123779.3123788
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Although Python is one of the most widely used programming languages, and it is a
                  foundation for a variety of parallel and distributed computing frameworks, it still
                  lacks an applicable and reliable software transactional memory. In this paper, we
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 162
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Citations5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Downloads162
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 12 Months29
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 6 weeks3

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F3123779.3123788&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28memory%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28memory%29%29Highlights
