                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            On the energy-efficiency of software transactional memory
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • F. Klein, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • A. Baldassin, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • G. Araujo, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • P. Centoducatte, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • R. Azevedo
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            SBCCI '09: Proceedings of the 22nd Annual Symposium on Integrated Circuits and System Design:
                     Chip on the DunesAugust 2009, Article No.: 33, pp 1â6https://doi.org/10.1145/1601896.1601938
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Traditional software transactional memory designs are targeted towards performance
                  and therefore little is known about their impact on energy consumption. We provide,
                  in this paper, a comprehensive energy analysis of a standard STM design and propose
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 9
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 170
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Downloads170
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 12 Months6

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Scaling Shared Memory Multiprocessing Applications in Non-cache-coherent Domains
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Ho-Ren Chuang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Robert Lyerly, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Stefan Lankes, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Binoy Ravindran
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              SYSTOR '20: Proceedings of the 13th ACM International Systems and Storage ConferenceMay 2020, pp 13â24https://doi.org/10.1145/3383669.3398278
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Due to the slowdown of Moore's Law, systems designers have begun integrating non-cache-coherent
                  heterogeneous computing elements in order to continue scaling performance. Programming
                  such systems has traditionally been difficult - developers were forced ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 116
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Downloads116
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 12 Months82
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 6 weeks5

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Memory-Bound Proof-of-Work Acceleration for Blockchain Applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Kun Wu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Guohao Dai, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Xing Hu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Shuangchen Li, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Xinfeng Xie, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Yu Wang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Yuan Xie
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                DAC '19: Proceedings of the 56th Annual Design Automation Conference 2019June 2019, Article No.: 177, pp 1â6https://doi.org/10.1145/3316781.3317862
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Blockchain applications have shown huge potential in various domains. Proof of Work
                  (PoW) is the key procedure in blockchain applications, which exhibits the memory-bound
                  characteristic and hinders the performance improvement of blockchain accelerators.
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 770
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Citations2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Downloads770
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Last 12 Months400
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Last 6 weeks55

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  January 2018
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Scheduling multi-rate real-time applications on clustered many-core architectures
                     with memory constraints
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Matthias Becker, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Saad Mubeen, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Dakshina Dasari, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Moris Behnam, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Thomas Nolte
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ASPDAC '18: Proceedings of the 23rd Asia and South Pacific Design Automation ConferenceJanuary 2018, pp 560â567
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Access to shared memory is one of the main challenges for many-core processors. One
                  group of scheduling strategies for such platforms focuses on the division of tasks'
                  access to shared memory and code execution. This allows to orchestrate the access
                  to ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 71
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Citations3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Downloads71
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 12 Months6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Automatic and transparent I/O optimization with storage integrated application runtime
                     support
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Noah Watkins, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Zhihao Jia, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Galen Shipman, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Carlos Maltzahn, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Alex Aiken, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Pat McCormick
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    PDSW '15: Proceedings of the 10th Parallel Data Storage WorkshopNovember 2015, pp 49â54https://doi.org/10.1145/2834976.2834983
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Traditionally storage has not been part of a programming model's semantics and is
                  added only as an I/O library interface. As a result, programming models, languages,
                  and storage systems are limited in the optimizations they can perform for I/O ...

                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 152
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Citations1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Downloads152
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 12 Months19
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 6 weeks2
