                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      March 2011
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Selective hardware/software memory virtualization
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Xiaolin Wang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Jiarui Zang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Zhenlin Wang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Yingwei Luo, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Xiaoming Li
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      VEE '11: Proceedings of the 7th ACM SIGPLAN/SIGOPS international conference on Virtual execution
                     environmentsMarch 2011, pp 217â226https://doi.org/10.1145/1952682.1952710
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      As virtualization becomes a key technique for supporting cloud computing, much effort
                  has been made to reduce virtualization overhead, so a virtualized system can match
                  its native performance. One major overhead is due to memory or page table ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Also Published in:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ACM SIGPLAN Notices: Volume 46 Issue 7, July 2011

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Analytical/ML mixed approach for concurrency regulation in software transactional
                     memory
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Diego Rughetti, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Pierangelo Di Sanzo, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Bruno Ciciani, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Francesco Quaglia
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        CCGRID '14: Proceedings of the 14th IEEE/ACM International Symposium on Cluster, Cloud, and Grid
                     ComputingMay 2014, pp 81â91https://doi.org/10.1109/CCGrid.2014.118
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        In this article we exploit a combination of analytical and Machine Learning (ML) techniques
                  in order to build a performance model allowing to dynamically tune the level of concurrency
                  of applications based on Software Transactional Memory (STM). Our ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Citations2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Downloads6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 12 Months0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Interactive Code Adaptation Tool for Modernizing Applications for Intel Knights Landing
                     Processors
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Ritu Arora, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Lars Koesterke
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          PEARC17: Proceedings of the Practice and Experience in Advanced Research Computing 2017 on
                     Sustainability, Success and ImpactJuly 2017, Article No.: 28, pp 1â8https://doi.org/10.1145/3093338.3093352
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The process of code adaptation to take advantage of the latest innovations in a supercomputing
                  platform begins with learning about the details of the platform's underlying hardware.
                  It can be challenging for many users to spend time and effort in ...

                                                                                                                   
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 73
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Downloads73
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 12 Months1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            April 2019
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Open Access
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Finding and Fixing Performance Pathologies in Persistent Memory Software Stacks
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Jian Xu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Juno Kim, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Amirsaman Memaripour, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Steven Swanson
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ASPLOS '19: Proceedings of the Twenty-Fourth International Conference on Architectural Support
                     for Programming Languages and Operating SystemsApril 2019, pp 427â439https://doi.org/10.1145/3297858.3304077
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Emerging fast, non-volatile memories will enable systems with large amounts of non-volatile
                  main memory (NVMM) attached to the CPU memory bus, bringing the possibility of dramatic
                  performance gains for IO-intensive applications. This paper analyzes the ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 9
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 1,176
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Citations9
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Downloads1,176
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 12 Months380
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 6 weeks41
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F3297858.3304077&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28memory%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28memory%29%29Highlights
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              June 2016
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Exposing errors related to weak memory in GPU applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Tyler Sorensen, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Alastair F. Donaldson
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              PLDI '16: Proceedings of the 37th ACM SIGPLAN Conference on Programming Language Design and
                     ImplementationJune 2016, pp 100â113https://doi.org/10.1145/2908080.2908114
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               We present the systematic design of a testing environment that uses stressing and
                  fuzzing to reveal errors in GPU applications that arise due to weak memory effects.
                  We evaluate our approach on seven GPUs spanning three Nvidia architectures, across
                  ten ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Also Published in:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ACM SIGPLAN Notices: Volume 51 Issue 6, June 2016

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 22
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 393
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Metrics
