                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                November 2014
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scalable kernel fusion for memory-bound GPU applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Mohamed Wahib, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Naoya Maruyama
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                SC '14: Proceedings of the International Conference for High Performance Computing, Networking,
                     Storage and AnalysisNovember 2014, pp 191â202https://doi.org/10.1109/SC.2014.21
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                GPU implementations of HPC applications relying on finite difference methods can include
                  tens of kernels that are memory-bound. Kernel fusion can improve performance by reducing
                  data traffic to off-chip memory; kernels that share data arrays are fused ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 22
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 495
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  June 2012
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  A modular memory optimization for synchronous data-flow languages: application to arrays in a lustre compiler
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • LÃ©onard GÃ©rard, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Adrien Guatto, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • CÃ©dric Pasteur, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Marc Pouzet
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  LCTES '12: Proceedings of the 13th ACM SIGPLAN/SIGBED International Conference on Languages,
                     Compilers, Tools and Theory for Embedded SystemsJune 2012, pp 51â60https://doi.org/10.1145/2248418.2248426
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The generation of efficient sequential code for synchronous data-flow languages raises
                  two intertwined issues: control and memory optimization. While the former has been
                  extensively studied, for instance in the compilation of Lustre and Signal, the ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Also Published in:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ACM SIGPLAN Notices: Volume 47 Issue 5, MAY 2012

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 17
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 179
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Metrics

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  •

                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The application slowdown model: quantifying and controlling the impact of inter-application interference at shared
                     caches and main memory
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Lavanya Subramanian, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Vivek Seshadri, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Arnab Ghosh, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Samira Khan, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Onur Mutlu
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    MICRO-48: Proceedings of the 48th International Symposium on MicroarchitectureDecember 2015, pp 62â75https://doi.org/10.1145/2830772.2830803
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    In a multi-core system, interference at shared resources (such as caches and main
                  memory) slows down applications running on different cores. Accurately estimating
                  the slowdown of each application has several benefits: e.g., it can enable shared
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 83
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 526
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Citations83
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Downloads526
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 12 Months33
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 6 weeks3

                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Improving application launch times with hybrid disks
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Yongsoo Joo, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Youngjin Cho, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Kyungsoo Lee, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Naehyuck Chang
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      CODES+ISSS '09: Proceedings of the 7th IEEE/ACM international conference on Hardware/software codesign
                     and system synthesisOctober 2009, pp 373â382https://doi.org/10.1145/1629435.1629486
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Application launch times, which are important to users, are primarily bounded by disk
                  seek times. A solid-state disk has a negligible seek time, but large solid-state disks
                  are not cost-effective. A hybrid disk, consisting of a large disk drive and a ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 261
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Metrics

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Downloads261
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 12 Months1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        November 2010
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Asynchronous lease-based replication of software transactional memory
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Nuno Carvalho, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Paolo Romano, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • LuÃ­s Rodrigues
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Middleware '10: Proceedings of the ACM/IFIP/USENIX 11th International Conference on MiddlewareNovember 2010, pp 376â396
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Software Transactional Memory (STM) systems have emerged as a powerful middleware
                  paradigm for parallel programming. At current date, however, the problem of how to
                  leverage replication to enhance dependability and scalability of STMs is still largely
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 11
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 87
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Citations11
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Downloads87
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 12 Months0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 6 weeks0
