                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The impact of paravirtualized memory hierarchy on linear algebra computational kernels
                     and software
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Lamia Youseff, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Keith Seymour, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Haihang You, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Jack Dongarra, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Rich Wolski
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        HPDC '08: Proceedings of the 17th international symposium on High performance distributed computingJune 2008, pp 141â152https://doi.org/10.1145/1383422.1383440
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Previous studies have revealed that paravirtualization imposes minimal performance
                  overhead on High Performance Computing (HPC) workloads, while exposing numerous benefits
                  for this field. In this study, we are investigating the memory hierarchy ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 23
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 455
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Citations23
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Downloads455
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 12 Months2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Low-overhead software transactional memory with progress guarantees and strong semantics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Minjia Zhang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Jipeng Huang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Man Cao, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Michael D. Bond
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          PPoPP 2015: Proceedings of the 20th ACM SIGPLAN Symposium on Principles and Practice of Parallel
                     ProgrammingJanuary 2015, pp 97â108https://doi.org/10.1145/2688500.2688510
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Software transactional memory offers an appealing alternative to locks by improving
                  programmability, reliability, and scalability. However, existing STMs are impractical
                  because they add high instrumentation costs and often provide weak progress ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Also Published in:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ACM SIGPLAN Notices: Volume 50 Issue 8, August 2015 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 15
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 277
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Citations15
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Downloads277
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 12 Months8

                                                                                                                                                                                                     
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            March 2017
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Novel parallel Givens QR decomposition implementation on VLIW architecture with Efficient
                     memory access for real time image processing applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Mohamed Najoui, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Anas Hatim, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Said Belkouch
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            BDCA'17: Proceedings of the 2nd international Conference on Big Data, Cloud and ApplicationsMarch 2017, Article No.: 89, pp 1â6https://doi.org/10.1145/3090354.3090445
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Compressed Sensing (CS) methods impact is important in the health care systems. The
                  acquisition and the processing speed of many medical imaging applications is highly
                  improved using this technique. Orthogonal Matching Pursuit (OMP) is one of the widely
                  ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 45
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                     November 2014

                                                                                                                                                                                                 
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Efficient shared-memory implementation of high-performance conjugate gradient benchmark
                     and its application to unstructured matrices
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Jongsoo Park, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Mikhail Smelyanskiy, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Karthikeyan Vaidyanathan, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Alexander Heinecke, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Dhiraj D. Kalamkar, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Xing Liu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Md. Mosotofa Ali Patwary, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Yutong Lu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Pradeep Dubey
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              SC '14: Proceedings of the International Conference for High Performance Computing, Networking,
                     Storage and AnalysisNovember 2014, pp 945â955https://doi.org/10.1109/SC.2014.82
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A new sparse high performance conjugate gradient benchmark (HPCG) has been recently
                  released to address challenges in the design of sparse linear solvers for the next
                  generation extreme-scale computing systems. Key computation, data access, and ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 16
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 275
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Citations16
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Downloads275
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 12 Months15

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Free
