                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Memory efficient state-space analysis in software model-checking
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Anshuman Mukherjee, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Zahir Tari, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Peter Bertok
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ACSC '10: Proceedings of the Thirty-Third Australasian Conferenc on Computer Science - Volume
                     102January 2010, pp 23â32
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Formal methods have an unprecedented ability to endorse the correctness of a system. In spite of
                  that, it has been limited to safety-critical and mission-critical systems owing to
                  significant time and memory costs involved. Lately, our ever increasing ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 91
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Downloads91

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  May 2018
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Distinguished Paper
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Static automated program repair for heap properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Rijnard van Tonder, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Claire Le Goues
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ICSE '18: Proceedings of the 40th International Conference on Software EngineeringMay 2018, pp 151â162https://doi.org/10.1145/3180155.3180250
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Static analysis tools have demonstrated effectiveness at finding bugs in real world
                  code. Such tools are increasingly widely adopted to improve software quality in practice.
                  Automated Program Repair (APR) has the potential to further cut down on the ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    An improved algorithm for slicing machine code
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Venkatesh Srinivasan, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Thomas Reps
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    OOPSLA 2016: Proceedings of the 2016 ACM SIGPLAN International Conference on Object-Oriented Programming,
                     Systems, Languages, and ApplicationsOctober 2016, pp 378â393https://doi.org/10.1145/2983990.2984003
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Machine-code slicing is an important primitive for building binary analysis and rewriting
                  tools, such as taint trackers, fault localizers, and partial evaluators. However,
                  it is not easy to create a machine-code slicer that exhibits a high level of ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Also Published in:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ACM SIGPLAN Notices: Volume 51 Issue 10, October 2016

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 13
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 338
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Downloads338
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 12 Months65
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 6 weeks15

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Speculative out-of-order event processing with software transaction memory
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Andrey Brito, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Christof Fetzer, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Heiko Sturzrehm, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Pascal Felber
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      DEBS '08: Proceedings of the second international conference on Distributed event-based systemsJuly 2008, pp 265â275https://doi.org/10.1145/1385989.1386023
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      In event stream applications, events flow through a network of components that perform
                  various types of operations, e.g., filtering, aggregation, transformation. When the
                  operation only depends on the input events, one can trivially parallelize its ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 38
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 494
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Downloads494
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 12 Months23
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 6 weeks2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        June 2009
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Two memory allocators that use hints to improve locality
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Alin Jula, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Lawrence Rauchwerger
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ISMM '09: Proceedings of the 2009 international symposium on Memory managementJune 2009, pp 109â118https://doi.org/10.1145/1542431.1542447
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Dynamic memory allocators affect an application's performance through their data layout
                  quality. They can use an application's allocation hints to improve the spatial locality
                  of this layout. However, a practical approach needs to be automatic, without ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 16
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 380
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •
