                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      μIR -An intermediate representation for transforming and optimizing the microarchitecture
                     of application accelerators
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Amirali Sharifian, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Reza Hojabr, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Navid Rahimi, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Sihao Liu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Apala Guha, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Tony Nowatzki, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Arrvindh Shriraman
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      MICRO '52: Proceedings of the 52nd Annual IEEE/ACM International Symposium on MicroarchitectureOctober 2019, pp 940â953https://doi.org/10.1145/3352460.3358292
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Creating high quality application-specific accelerators requires us to make iterative
                  changes to both algorithm behavior and microarchitecture, and this is a tedious and
                  error-prone process. High-Level Synthesis (HLS) tools [5, 10] generate RTL for ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        March 2008
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Memory technology for extended large-scale integration in future electronics applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Dinesh Pamunuwa
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        DATE '08: Proceedings of the conference on Design, automation and test in EuropeMarch 2008, pp 1126â1127https://doi.org/10.1145/1403375.1403649
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Extending 2-D planar topologies in integrated circuits (ICs) to a 3-D implementation
                  has the obvious benefits of reducing the overall footprint and average interconnection
                  length, with associated improvements in cost, and delay and energy consumption, ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 189
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Downloads189
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 12 Months2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          research-article

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Uncertainty Modeling of Emerging Device based Computing-in-Memory Neural Accelerators
                     with Application to Neural Architecture Search
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Zheyu Yan, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Da-Cheng Juan, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Xiaobo Sharon Hu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Yiyu Shi
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ASPDAC '21: Proceedings of the 26th Asia and South Pacific Design Automation ConferenceJanuary 2021, pp 859â864https://doi.org/10.1145/3394885.3431635
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          emerging device based Computing-in-memory (CiM) has been proved to be a promising
                  candidate for high energy efficiency deep neural network (DNN) computations. However,
                  most emerging devices suffer uncertainty issues, resulting in a difference between
                  ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 45
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            A software memory partition approach for eliminating bank-level interference in multicore
                     systems
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Lei Liu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Zehan Cui, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Mingjie Xing, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Yungang Bao, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Mingyu Chen, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Chengyong Wu
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            PACT '12: Proceedings of the 21st international conference on Parallel architectures and compilation
                     techniquesSeptember 2012, pp 367â376https://doi.org/10.1145/2370816.2370869
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Main memory system is a shared resource in modern multicore machines, resulting in
                  serious interference, which causes performance degradation in terms of throughput
                  slowdown and unfairness. Numerous new memory scheduling algorithms have been proposed
                  to ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 893
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                     Published By ACM

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              On improving heap memory layout by dynamic pool allocation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Zhenjiang Wang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Chenggang Wu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Pen-Chung Yew
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              CGO '10: Proceedings of the 8th annual IEEE/ACM international symposium on Code generation
                     and optimizationApril 2010, pp 92â100https://doi.org/10.1145/1772954.1772969
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Dynamic memory allocation is widely used in modern programs. General-purpose heap
                  allocators often focus more on reducing their run-time overhead and memory space utilization,
                  but less on exploiting the characteristics of their allocated heap objects. ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 11
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 508
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Citations11
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Downloads508
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 12 Months17
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •
