                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          November 2015
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Optimistic shared memory dependence tracing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Yanyan Jiang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Du Li, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Chang Xu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Xiaoxing Ma, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Jian Lu
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ASE '15: Proceedings of the 30th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Automated Software EngineeringNovember 2015, pp 524â534https://doi.org/10.1109/ASE.2015.11
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Inter-thread shared memory dependences are crucial to understanding the behavior of
                  concurrent systems, as such dependences are the cornerstone of time-travel debugging
                  and further predictive trace analyses. To enable effective and efficient shared ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 19
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Citations1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Downloads19
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 12 Months6

                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Memory-Centric Communication Mechanism for Real-time Autonomous Navigation Applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • wei liu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • yifan gong, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • hao wu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • jidong zhai, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • jiangming jin
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ICPP '20: 49th International Conference on Parallel Processing - ICPPAugust 2020, Article No.: 33, pp 1â11https://doi.org/10.1145/3404397.3404459
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            There has been a remarkable increase in the speed of AI development over the past
                  few years. Artificial intelligence and deep learning techniques are blooming and expanding
                  in all forms to every sector possible. With the emerging intelligent autonomous ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 72
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              January 2017
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Published By ACM

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Automatically comparing memory consistency models
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • John Wickerson, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Mark Batty, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Tyler Sorensen, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • George A. Constantinides
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              POPL 2017: Proceedings of the 44th ACM SIGPLAN Symposium on Principles of Programming LanguagesJanuary 2017, pp 190â204https://doi.org/10.1145/3009837.3009838
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A memory consistency model (MCM) is the part of a programming language or computer architecture specification
                  that defines which values can legally be read from shared memory locations. Because
                  MCMs take into account various optimisations employed by ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Also Published in:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ACM SIGPLAN Notices: Volume 52 Issue 1, January 2017

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 60
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 419
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 6 weeks5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Save to Binder

                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  •

                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                A prefetch-aware memory system for data access patterns in multimedia applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Tareq A. Alawneh, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Ahmed Elhossini
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                CF '18: Proceedings of the 15th ACM International Conference on Computing FrontiersMay 2018, pp 78â87https://doi.org/10.1145/3203217.3203279
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                As the speed gap between CPU and external memory widens, memory latency has become
                  the dominant performance bottleneck in modern applications. Closely connected are
                  caches which play an important role in reducing the average memory latency. The way
                  data ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Method for Reducing Overhead of Shared Memory Access Instrumentation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Qianyu Liu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Naijie Gu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Junjie Su
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  CSAE 2019: Proceedings of the 3rd International Conference on Computer Science and Application
                     EngineeringOctober 2019, Article No.: 9, pp 1â6https://doi.org/10.1145/3331453.3361323
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Memory monitoring is crucial for understanding the memory access behavior of applications.
                  Especially in multithreaded programs, dealing with concurrency bugs relies on tracking
                  and analyzing accesses to shared memory. Instrumentation is widely used to ...

  Published By ACM
